body.name: Perry Ellis Men's Portfolio 100% Leather Reversible Belt With Matte Gunmetal Plaque Buckle (Sizes 30-44 Inches), Brn30, 30

features: GENUINE LEATHER: This modern men’s dress belt is a classic well-crafted staple. Made with genuine bonded leather, a high-quality material that offers exceptional durability and maintains its natural texture even after long-term use.

REVERSIBLE: This versatile men’s leather belt can be worn in two ways. Just pull the buckle out and spin it around to change your belt from brown to black, instantly making your new favorite belt a must-have for your formal looks.

EVERYWHERE WEAR: This men’s reversible belt is a versatile addition to your wardrobe. Minimal design makes it the perfect on-the-go dress belt that transitions from the office to formal events. We recommend buying the same size as your pant size.

PLAQUE BUCKLE: Complete your timeless look with this men’s belt. It features a contemporary plaque swivel buckle outlined with a matte gunmetal finish and a discrete engraved Perry Ellis logo. It definitely gives a touch of sophistication to any outfit.

COMFORT FIT: Enjoy a comfortable fit with this leather belt for men, featuring a matte gunmetal plaque buckle, seven holes strategically placed for a consistently better fit, and a 1.5” width that fits well with most dress pant loops.
body.description: Step up your style game with our modern men's dress belt, a true classic and expertly crafted essential. Made from genuine bonded leather, this high-quality belt offers exceptional durability and maintains its natural texture even after long-term use. Versatility meets elegance with its unique reversible feature, allowing you to effortlessly switch from brown to black, making it a must-have accessory for all your formal looks. Whether it's the office or a special event, this minimalistic belt seamlessly transitions with you, adding a touch of sophistication to any outfit. Embrace comfort with its matte gunmetal plaque buckle, seven strategically placed holes, and a 1.5" width, ensuring a consistently better fit. Complete your timeless look and elevate your style with this exceptional men's belt.

Everywhere Wear A versatile addition to your wardrobe. Minimal design makes it the perfect on-the-go dress belt that transitions from the office to formal events. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I really needed the right brown to match my shoes/outfit. This is it! Of course, double sided for convenience as an added bonus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality amazing belt
reviews.reviewText: Love it - amazing quality and leather

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It is not genuine leather
reviews.reviewText: Just 2 weeks after first use, it did begin to peel, very bad quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice belt overall
reviews.reviewText: I like the look of this belt. I bought it for my 12 year old son. Very clean look with the buckle design. Only draw back is that it was very stiff leather. Other than that it was good :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2018
reviews.reviewText: Thought the quality was better, the leather was cracking on my 1st day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Fix your manufacturing defect, Perry Ellis!
reviews.reviewText: I had the same experience as many others here. The ball on the end of the buckle prong fell off after only a couple of months, and now my belt fat shames me constantly by popping open at random times. Do not buy.

reviews.reviewTitle: This is of good quality and feature

reviews.reviewText: Busqué por mucho tiempo un cinturón de este color, con la hebilla de este material, acabado y tamaño. Se ve muy bien construido, buena calidad, duradero. Todo excelente con el envío, la entrega y todo. Lo recomiendo.
